newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: RBNZ to offer NZ$100 mln of govt bonds in tender.
newsitem.headline: RBNZ to offer NZ$100 mln of govt bonds in tender.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of New Zealand said on Thursday it would offer NZ$100 million of February 2001 government bonds at its next tender on October 31.
The bonds have an 8.00 percent coupon.
Bids close 11.30 a.m. (2230 GMT), results will be announced at 1 p.m. and settlement is November 5.
The RBNZ said in addition to the $100 million of bonds offered for tender, it would purchase $150 million of February 2001 bonds for its own portfolio.
